content.question: For what value of x does the function <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>−</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <msup> <mrow> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>−</mo> <mn>3</mn> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4757@</annotation> </semantics> </math> have a relative maximum?
